name: Sunken Ruins
description: Ancient buildings that have been submerged by rising waters or sinking land, creating an underwater archaeological site. The preserved artifacts and unique underwater environment attract scholars and divers, while the challenging conditions create opportunities for specialized exploration.
atmosphere: Ancient buildings loom through murky water like ghosts of forgotten civilization. Air carries salt, old stone, and preserved artifacts scent. Footsteps echo through chambers that now ripple with underwater currents. Skin tingles with sense of preserved artifacts and unique underwater environment. Taste of archaeological mystery and underwater exploration fills mouth. Weight of sunken history and challenging conditions presses down on you.
